column3: School of Mathematics and Computer Science
column5: **APPLICATIONS FOR 22/23 ENTRY FOR THIS PROGRAMME HAVE NOW CLOSED AND WILL REOPEN 1ST OCTOBER 2022 FOR 23/24 ENTRY**Swansea University and Université Grenoble Alpes offer two dual award MSc degrees in Computer Science: Informatique.Both courses lead to degrees from both universities and both are two academic years-long, involving one year in Swansea and one year in Grenoble. The year in Grenoble is usually taught in English but can be taken in French if you are sufficiently fluent.The Grenoble route starts in Grenoble and finishes in Swansea.
